channel.title: Item-rsses on Miner
channel.description: Recent content in Item-rsses on Miner

item.title: Dashboard Driven
item.description: A personalised dashboard view for each user. A reactive dashboard screen that gives the user an at a glance overview of the system, any updates to worksets and any active alerts.

item.title: Collaborative Worksets
item.description:
Share investigations between teams, comment on any piece of data, set up real time alerts for when data changes and export to external systems.

Users can carry out investigations on a specific groups of data. A dashboard view provides an overview of all their current worksets.

item.title: Workset Summary
item.description: Workset Summary. A responsive system overview customised for each user

item.title: Network view of data
item.description: Network view of workset data. See how the entities in a workset are related. Increase the depth of the relationships to discover patterns and relationship clusters.

item.title: Location aware data view
item.description: Workset Location view. Any entity with GeoLocation information, will be displayed on the map. The map instantly reflects any incoming data with location information.

item.title: Comments
item.description: Comments can be attached to all entities and links within the system. They will be visible as per access requirements. Additionally they are also full text indexed and can be searched from any point in the system.

item.title: Entity Search
item.description:
Entities within the system can be searched for on a combination of any of their underlying attributes. Create worksets for further investigation or to send another user.

Searches can be carried out by name, type, attributes or any combination

By name

By type

By name and type

item.title: Entity Entry
item.description: Entity details can be viewed and amended. Add comments and attributes on an ad-hoc basis. Create new relationships to other entities

item.title: Link View
item.description: Link Overview. You can see all the links held in the system as well as being able to search by name and type. Display links in chronological order as the data updates.

item.title: Datasource
item.description: Datasource Management which allows real time gathering of data or importing from a static data set. Data can then be shared with other users or used in isolation.

item.title: Network View
item.description:
Network View of all data in the system. Visualize data connections and relationships. Find the shortest path between two points or drill down to isolate relationships.

Data volume

Large datasets can be explored

Data Insight

Hovering over any data point highlights the connected entities

Shortest Path

Discover the shortest path between two entities. Quickly convert all nodes into the path to allow for further investigation.

item.title: Network Search
item.description: Dynamically typed queries can be construted via an intuitive GUI. Interactive graph based searching which can then be used as the basis for further investigation.

item.title: Map View
item.description: Any data with GeoLocation information will automatically be displayed on a map view. The map updates in real time as new GeoLocation data enters the system.

item.title: Admin View
item.description:
Full administration of the system including user and permissions management, metadata management and data source definition.

User access and permissions

Users and access permissions are maintained via the admin section

Audit

All events that take place in the system are fully audited

Datasource Management

Datasources can be managed via a GUI

Where credentials are required to access the datasource there will be fields to enter the relevant information

Metadata Management

All system metadata is managed from a single location

All the relevant data fields for metadata can be modified
